Reviews.Title: cute but not functional
Reviews.Author: L. Michaels
Reviews.Content: This camera is cute and small which is good for a toddler.  The LCD screen on back is very tiny and the image is not easy to see on it.  I didn't realize that I had to buy a separate memory card for this camera.  It only holds ONE photo without the memory card.

Reviews.Title: Sigh.
Reviews.Author: Vyxter
Reviews.Content: What a painful disappointment. We were excited to buy our little photographer a cute camera no one else in the family would mistake for theirs, plus she likes pink. But this thing is garbage.

Reviews.Title: cute for a toddler
Reviews.Author: Suespark
Reviews.Content: Cute camera for the princess loving toddler!  My niece loves to take pictures and view them on the screen.  SD card optional, but needing it for the extra storage is not a big deal, since for her, the joy is in taking and immediately viewing the picture.

Reviews.Title: it doesnt work
Reviews.Author: amyjohnson
Reviews.Content: i opened it and tried to take pictures and it keeps saying fail and blinks doesnt work still have it and it s sittting here doing nothing that i thougth it would my daughter was very disappointed

Reviews.Title: Very good jugute'm really surprised
Reviews.Author: Francisco Arteaga
Reviews.Content: Very good jugute'm really surprised at how excellent the only product that I need more memory but overall I like the product, for a child of 4-6 years old, takes high quality photographs clear olo children but absolutely recommend

Reviews.Title: Great camera
Reviews.Author: Andrea J. Dare
Reviews.Content: Great little camera for the price. You do need to get a micro SD card before using. My 3 year old Great niece loves it. She felt very grown up taking pictures!

Reviews.Title: Didn't work!
Reviews.Author: Norm Bagley
Reviews.Content: My little girl got this for Christmas.  She was so disappointed when the only 2 pictures she was able to take were very grainy and unable to even determine what the picture was.  Then the camera just stopped working altogether.  It just kept staying frozen and when you tried to take a pic it never would work.  This camera is garbage!  It looks cute but definitely a waste.  We weren't able to send it back in time either so a COMPLETE waste of money and time!  What a disappointment for everyone!

Reviews.Title: Really not worth it - should have listened to the reviews
Reviews.Author: J. Priddy "soundsprincess"
Reviews.Content: Hopefully you listen to the reviews, which I did not. We purchased this for my five year old niece, almost six. it was difficult to figure out even for us adults, the memory card can only be 1G which these days is near impossible to find. we had to dig up an old one of ours to use the camera. when we finally figured out it WILL NOT WORK without the 1G Memory card (even though it is suppose to) the pictures were horrible. Its cute product but really not up to today's standards. Sorry!

ProductInfo.Features:
3MP Digital Camera
Built-in Electronic Flash
1" Color Preview Screen
Memory Card Slot-Holds up to 1 GB SD Card
4X Digital Zoom
ProductInfo.Name: Pixie Princess Digital Camera with Flash
